mdRecord.dcterms:description: Because of his friendship with the Cabell family, the use of the Roman Doric order, certain exterior details and the floor plan, Thomas Jefferson is often associated with the design of Montezuma. It is certain that specific details are Jeffersonian.... No documentation has surfaced to confirm this tradition, although Jefferson or his builders may have indeed directly influenced the parti. -- http://www.dhr.virginia.gov/registers/Counties/Nelson/062-0010_Montezuma_1980_Final_Nomination.pdf [work]
